patch:
@@ -1,6 +1,8 @@
 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
 <manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
     package="com.geekbrain.androidlevel1">
+    <!--  В Manifest прописываем разрешения. Проверяет что вобще наше android приложение может -->
+    <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" />
 
     <application
         android:allowBackup="true"
@@ -9,13 +11,21 @@
         android:roundIcon="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round"
         android:supportsRtl="true"
         android:theme="@style/Theme.AndroidLevel1">
+        <activity
+            android:name=".EditTextActivity"
+            android:label="@string/title_activity_edit_text"
+            android:theme="@style/Theme.AndroidLevel1.NoActionBar">
+            <intent-filter>
+                <action android:name=".EditTextActivity" />
+                <category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
+            </intent-filter>
+        </activity>
         <activity
             android:name=".MainActivity"
             android:label="@string/app_name"
             android:theme="@style/Theme.AndroidLevel1.NoActionBar">
             <intent-filter>
                 <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
-
                 <category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" />
             </intent-filter>
         </activity>

@@ -0,0 +1,25 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<selector xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android">
+    <item android:state_pressed="true" >
+        <shape android:shape="rectangle"  >
+            <corners android:radius="10dip" />
+            <stroke android:width="3dip" android:color="#9e3d1c" />
+            <gradient android:angle="180" android:startColor="#99462a" android:endColor="#af5a3d" />
+        </shape>
+    </item>
+    <item android:state_focused="true">
+        <shape android:shape="rectangle"  >
+            <corners android:radius="10dip" />
+            <stroke android:width="3dip" android:color="#9e3d1c" />
+            <!-- Градинет , угол-->
+            <gradient android:angle="180" android:startColor="#99462a" android:endColor="#af5a3d" />
+        </shape>
+    </item>
+    <item>
+        <shape android:shape="rectangle"  >
+            <corners android:radius="10dip" />
+            <stroke android:width="2dip" android:color="#9e3d1c" />
+            <gradient android:angle="180" android:startColor="#000000" android:endColor="#af5a3d" />
+        </shape>
+    </item>
+</selector>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,29 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<selector xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android">
+    <!-- Cтиль для нажатия кнопки
+           shape - форма, corners - скругление, stroke - обводка, solid - основной цвет.
+    -->
+    <item android:state_pressed="true" >
+        <shape android:shape="rectangle"  >
+            <corners android:radius="20dip" />
+            <stroke android:width="4dip" android:color="#acb5c4" />
+            <solid android:color="#cbd0d8"/>
+        </shape>
+    </item>
+    <!-- Стиль при наведении курсора-->
+    <item android:state_focused="true">
+        <shape android:shape="rectangle"  >
+            <corners android:radius="20dip" />
+            <stroke android:width="4dip" android:color="#acb5c4" />
+            <solid android:color="#cbd0d8"/>
+        </shape>
+    </item>
+    <item>
+        <!-- Первоночальное состояние-->
+        <shape android:shape="rectangle"  >
+            <corners android:radius="20dip" />
+            <stroke android:width="4dip" android:color="#acb5c4" />
+            <solid android:color="#cbd0d8"/>
+        </shape>
+    </item>
+</selector>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
+    android:layout_margin="2dp"
+    android:padding="2dp">
+
+    <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView
+        android:layout_width="40dp"
+        android:layout_height="32dp"
+        android:layout_margin="4dp"
+        app:cardCornerRadius="4dp"
+        app:cardBackgroundColor="@android:color/holo_red_light">
+
+        <TextView
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="match_parent"
+            android:id="@+id/text_view"
+            android:textColor="@color/white"
+            android:gravity="center"
+            />
+
+    </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
+
+
+
+</RelativeLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,82 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
+    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:background="@color/blue_dark"
+    android:orientation="vertical"
+    tools:context=".EditTextActivity">
+
+
+    <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/textView2"
+        android:layout_marginTop="100dp"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:text="@string/i_am_second_activity"
+        android:textSize="20sp"
+        android:fontFamily="monospace"
+        android:textColor="@color/white"
+        android:gravity="center"       />
+
+    <EditText
+        android:id="@+id/editText1"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:hint="@string/email"
+        android:textColorHint="@color/black"
+        android:layout_height="50dp"
+        android:ems="10"
+        android:layout_marginLeft="50dp"
+        android:layout_marginRight="50dp"
+        android:layout_marginTop="20dp"
+        android:background="@drawable/fields"
+        android:padding="10dp"/>
+    <EditText
+        android:id="@+id/editText2"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:hint="@string/password"
+        android:textColorHint="@color/black"
+        android:layout_height="50dp"
+        android:ems="10"
+        android:layout_marginLeft="50dp"
+        android:layout_marginRight="50dp"
+        android:layout_marginTop="20dp"
+        android:background="@drawable/fields"
+        android:padding="10dp"/>
+
+    <EditText
+        android:id="@+id/editText3"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:hint="@string/phone"
+        android:textColorHint="@color/black"
+        android:layout_height="50dp"
+        android:ems="10"
+        android:layout_marginLeft="50dp"
+        android:layout_marginRight="50dp"
+        android:layout_marginTop="20dp"
+        android:layout_marginBottom="20dp"
+        android:background="@drawable/fields"
+        android:padding="10dp"/>
+
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/buttonBackActivity"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_marginLeft="100dp"
+        android:layout_marginRight="100dp"
+        android:background="@drawable/button"
+        android:fontFamily="monospace"
+
+        android:text="@string/backToMainActivity" />
+
+    <ImageView
+        android:id="@+id/imagePechenie"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:paddingTop="40sp"
+        app:srcCompat="@drawable/pechenie" />
+
+
+</LinearLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -1,19 +1,102 @@
 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
-<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout
+    xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:id="@+id/background"
     xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
     xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
     android:layout_width="match_parent"
     android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:background="#2E2C2C"
     tools:context=".MainActivity">
+    <!-- tools: Для превью.
+     wrap_content - расстянуть контейнер по содержимому.
+     0dp аналог match_parent (для constraint layout)
+     android:gravity 0.5 расположени по центру
+     dp - пиксели независимые от плотности
+     sp - dp для шрифта
+     in(mm) дюйм(мм)
+     app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.5" расположение отн-но ширины экрана
+     app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@+id/textView" привязка к textview
+     -->
+    <!-- android:src="@drawable/ic_twotone_directions_boat_24"/>
+    -->
+
+
+    <ImageView
+        android:id="@+id/imageView"
+        android:layout_width="50dp"
+        android:layout_height="50dp"
+        android:layout_marginTop="640dp"
+        android:src="@drawable/ic_twotone_directions_boat_24"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.955"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
+
+    <Switch
+        android:id="@+id/switchButton"
+        android:layout_width="83dp"
+        android:layout_height="41dp"
+        android:layout_marginStart="192dp"
+        android:layout_marginTop="4dp"
+        android:text="@string/aSwitch"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
+        tools:ignore="UseSwitchCompatOrMaterialXml" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/changeActivity"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:background="#FFEB3B"
+        android:text="Открыть вторую страницу"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.514"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+        tools:layout_editor_absoluteY="207dp" />
+
+    <org.naishadhparmar.zcustomcalendar.CustomCalendar
+        android:id="@+id/custom_calendar"
+        android:layout_width="351dp"
+        android:layout_height="263dp"
+        android:layout_marginStart="28dp"
+
+        android:layout_marginBottom="132dp"
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />
+
+    <CheckBox
+        android:id="@+id/checkBox"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:text="@string/checkbox"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
 
     <TextView
         android:id="@+id/textView"
         android:layout_width="wrap_content"
         android:layout_height="wrap_content"
-        android:layout_marginTop="116dp"
-        android:text="TextView"
-        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
-        app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.498"
+        app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.5"
+        android:layout_marginStart="164dp"
+        android:layout_marginTop="40dp"
+        android:text="@string/textview"
+        android:textSize="20sp"
         app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/toggleButton" />
+
+    <ToggleButton
+        android:id="@+id/toggleButton"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+
+
+        android:layout_marginStart="60dp"
+        android:layout_marginTop="28dp"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@+id/switchButton"
+        app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.095"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@+id/checkBox"
         app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
+
+
 </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
